alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 09 at 1:19PM MST until November 09 at 11:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Black Range. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected between 1- 4 PM over the Black Range in elevations above 7000 ft. Otherwise, winds in Grant County should be between 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
